leukapp.apps.leukforms.validators module¶

leukapp.apps.leukforms.validators.leukform_columns_validator(rows)[source]¶

leukapp.apps.leukforms.validators.leukform_csv_validator(document)[source]¶

NOTTESTED

leukapp.apps.leukforms.validators.leukform_rows_validator(rows)[source]¶

Validate that rows look good

leukapp.apps.leukforms.validators.leukform_specimen_order_validator(rows)[source]¶

Validate whether or not the order submitted is valid.

This function makes sure that the Specimen.order is unique at the Individual.ext_id (or Individual.slug if the leukid is submitted) and Specimen.ext_id levels.
